QuestData.Title: The Easiest Way To A Serpent's Heart
QuestData.Description: <The hatchling scowls at you.>$B$BUh-oh, looks like someone is in a bad mood today!$B$BLuckily, you know just the thing that will cheer up the little beast.$B$BCloud serpents love the taste of tiger meat, but the tender flanks can be... challenging... to acquire.$B$BLuckily, you recall there are some fat, juicy tigers to the northwest, on Windward Isle.$B$BSure, you might suffer some scratches and a little mauling, but it's all worth it for your serpent, right?
